channel.title: Server Crashing Due To Max Players
channel.description: I Have Max Players and Max Connection Set To 15 But Whenever It hits the max all the npc's die and the server crashes...is there a way around this with keeping the server limit?

item.title: Server Crashing Due To Max Players
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

there is no way to fix it…But you could put an auto restarter on it so it restarts every time it goes down

Read full topic
item.source: Server Crashing Due To Max Players
